Reviews.Title: “A good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: BolsEngland
Reviews.Content: husband stayed house hotel 21st 24th january found value money situated near lancaster gate paddington underground stations location clean quiet english breakfast cooked joseph wife friendly helpful hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “nice location, nice building, not so nice room”
Reviews.Author: clarasarabella
Reviews.Content: sister stayed weekend trip london price ok location unfortunately paying guarantee level cleanliness london youd building looks charming outside themselves size ok standard low bathroom particularly low standard breakfast served kitchen basement smoke hits soon walk stairs owner polite offer range cooked breakfasts personally prefer simple continental smoke

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay and very fine situated”
Reviews.Author: DanishTilst
Reviews.Content: arrived met manager told central heating didnâ´t properly polite competent 2 alternatives satisfied handled english breakfast tried 2 clean comfortable manager friendly helpfull try time london absolutely value money

Reviews.Title: “Pay up front”
Reviews.Author: toolieak
Reviews.Content: reserved 4 nights october front door manager told required pay total amount front cash despite reservation confirmation saying agreed pay half checkin rest departure reservation websites tarriff page emailed rates effect owner replied discount applied mentioned manager didnt paying rate clean comfortable grateful en suite location close paddington station navigation easy ok angry pay cash front explained reservation process wouldnt chosen hotel double check choose stay frankly wish wed stayed travelodge half trip

Reviews.Title: “Very average hotel with BAD management”
Reviews.Author: Savitar
Reviews.Content: stayed house sept 2010 night cheap stay night london concert night live outside london found house checked reviews tripadvisor single night try booked own website quick easy strange check 2 4pm day check rang 2pm ok check 6pm told record booking booking system single left pay upgrade double â£75 disagreed told booking told sort arrived arrived 6pm manager immediately happy voice angry abused hello sorry fault abuse upset told seriously customer service apologise mean idea talking perfectly nice told honour contract told pay mistake happen head tells pay upgrade fault website wrong disagreed course customer suffer websites offer skip breakfast help response â€œi donâ€™t care breakfast help sort customer service tells issue trouble expect etc etc understand fault booked web site confirmed booking rang ensure ok eventually lot complaining books mumbling breath issue double single beds sleep single bed towel bar seriously customer response â€œoh getting onto hotel location 2 mins walk paddington station hotel clean please flush toilet cleaning cleaning staff single beds broken double bed single fine 50 bathroom ok musky smell shower fine furniture 20 tv analogue tv channels actually watched clock alarm comment breakfast ok stay night desperate exceptionally poor management booking system onsite management

Reviews.Title: “Terrible stay, top floor with no lift, poor ventilation - felt very hostile.”
Reviews.Author: ratemerateyou
Reviews.Content: arrival staff reception wasnt reception stay downhill onwards manager refused recognise guest living door despite possession key located top floor lift stairs wouldve difficult manage elderly visitors required facilities acceptable cooler temperatures beware hotel accepts cash payment staff biggest establishment

Reviews.Title: “Good position, friendly people and free wifi”
Reviews.Author: StefanoW
Reviews.Content: im london months am regular customer couple course grand hotel price clean ensuite services free wifi internet access plus manager personnel friendly position youre central london paddington lancaster gate tube stations minutes walk 15 minutes oxford street hyde park definitely choice central london dont spend money

Reviews.Title: “excellent location, small, homely, clean,..home from home, friendly”
Reviews.Author: healthfirst2020
Reviews.Content: stayed house times 4 times excellent friendly servicethe hotel established english decor service little isnt plus rushed quiet hotel guaranteed peaceful night spotlessly clean owner help breakfast set day lovely manageress feel home level service safe hands

HotelInfo.Name: Albro House
HotelInfo.Address: 155 Sussex Gardens | Hyde Park, London W2 2RY, England
